name: In the Vaisso
description:
Due to an asteroid encounter, your ship: The Vaisso, has made an emergency landing on a neighbouring planet. You are now stuck inside the broken ship, luckily your RPR-droid unit S.O.S.A (Space Operating Shipwright Android) is here to help:
Use the droid to repair the correct mecanisms and help the astronaut escape on the emergency capsule.
Playing Instuctions :
- W + mouse to move in direction of the mouse.
- Space to shift character.
- To activate buttons or levers, click on them.
- Click on objects to lift them , and put them in the right spot.
All objects are consumable. Use T to drop objects on the ground.
- Generators need a battery to power , levers and buttons can require a generator or gears to be functional, gears can be fixed with a hammer.
